Up to 96% hair fall* reduction.

*Hair fall due to breakage and not due to medical conditions, basis lab tests against non-conditioning shampoo after 12 washes.

Himalaya Anti-Hair Fall Bhringaraja Shampoo is a breakthrough formulation using Plant Sciences, a special blend of selective botanical extracts and natural protein 5 technology, that helps reduce hair fall* and provides nourishment, making your hair healthy and beautiful.

The new, improved Anti-Hair Fall Bhringaraja Shampoo, suitable for both women and men, is infused with the goodness of Bhringaraja and Palasha, helping make hair healthy.

Bhringaraja, Palasha, The natural proteins of Soy and Wheat

- Effective for all hair types.
- Safe to use on artificially colored or permed hair.
- Paraben free.
- pH balanced.
- Cruelty free.
- Dermatologically tested.
- For external use only.
- Store in a cool and dry place, away from direct heat and sunlight.
- Our dermatologically tested formula is fortified with herbal ingredients.
- For best results, use Himalaya Anti-Hair Fall Conditioner after shampoo for smooth and conditioned hair.


Directions for Use:

Massage Himalaya Anti-Hair Fall Bhringaraja Shampoo gently into wet hair and scalp. Rinse thoroughly and repeat if necessary.

Product Type: Shampoo

Country of Origin: India

Key Ingredients
Ayurveda texts and modern research back the following facts

Bhringaraja

Palasha

Palasha helps reduce hair fall.

The natural proteins of Soy and Wheat

The natural proteins of Soy and Wheat help strengthen hair and reduce hair breakage, helping reduce hair damage, smoothening, and nourishing hair.
